remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]是无状态的，但 不是。 are stateless, but the is not. 各个交互之间将保持客户端的状态，以支持更新管理之类的功能。State on the client is maintained between interactions in order to support features such as update management. 这种类以及表示特定 HTTP 请求（针对数据服务）的 类是客户端库中的两个主要类。This class, and the class that represents a particular HTTP request to a data service, are the two main classes in the client library. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用“添加服务引用”工具所生成的 来隐式执行针对 Northwind 数据服务返回所有客户的查询。The following example shows how to use the generated by the Add Service Reference tool to implicitly execute a query against the Northwind data service that returns all customers. 该上下文自动确定请求的 `Customers` 实体集的 URI。The URI of the requested `Customers` entity set is determined automatically by the context. 在发生枚举时隐式执行该查询。The query is executed implicitly when the enumeration occurs. 完成后创建的 Northwind 数据服务[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。The Northwind data service is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知 ，相关源与目标对象之间存在新链接，且该链接由指定的源属性表示。Notifies the that a new link exists between the related source and target objects and that the link is represented by the specified source property. 将此链接添加到新创建的链接集，下次调用 时，会将该链接集发送到数据服务。The adds this link to the set of newly created links that will be sent to the data service on the next call to . 链接是单向关系。Links are one-way relationships. 关联是双向的因为在一对一关联您必须调用同样，若要创建的反向链接，并在多对一关联中必须调用创建引用链接到关联的"一"端。Because associations are bi-directional, in a one-to-one association you must call either again to create the reverse link, and in a many-to-one association you must call to create a reference link to the "one" end of the association. 目标对象类型必须是 `sourceProperty` 参数所标识的类型或该类型的子类型。The target object must be of the type identified by the `sourceProperty` parameter or a subtype of the type. ## Examples 以下示例演示如何使用 和 方法来创建用于定义关系的链接。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create links that define relationships. 在此示例中，还显式设置了 `Order_Details` 对象的导航属性。In this example, the navigation properties on the `Order_Details` object are also explicitly set. 此示例使用基于 Northwind 数据服务，它创建完成后添加服务引用工具生成的[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 对象可用于确定异步操作何时已完成。The returned object is used to determine when the asynchronous operation has completed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步操作](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Operations](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md). 方法使用与 方法相同的语义，但此方法异步发送请求，因此此调用在等待服务返回的结果时不会阻止处理。The method uses the same semantics as , however this method asynchronously sends the request so that this call does not block processing while waiting for the results from the service. 根据标准的 begin-end 异步模式，在检索查询结果时将调用所提供的回调。According to the standard begin-end asynchronous pattern, the provided callback is invoked when query results are retrieved. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何通过调用 方法以启动查询来执行异步查询。The following example shows how to execute an asynchronous query by calling the method to start the query. 内联委托调用 方法以显示查询结果。The inline delegate calls the method to display the query results. 此示例使用基于 Northwind 数据服务，它创建完成后添加服务引用工具生成的[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，将调用网络操作来检索属性的值。Calling this method invokes a network operation to retrieve the value of a property. 指定的属性可以是实体的任一属性，包括表示关联或链接的属性。The property specified may be any one of the properties on an entity, including properties which represent associations or links. 如果属性是表示关联、链接或延迟的属性，则调用此方法时，会向客户端提供延迟加载相关资源的方式。If the property represents an association or link or a deferred property, calling this method provides the client with a way to lazily load related resources. 如果实体处于已修改状态，则属性值将加载相关实体，并将这些实体及任何链接标记为“未更改”。If the entity is in the modified state, the property value loads related entities and marks them and any links as unchanged. 如果已加载属性，则调用此方法可让您刷新该属性的值。If the property is already loaded, calling this method lets you refresh the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用 、、、、、、 或 ，将更改添加到 。Changes are added to the by calling the , , , , , , , or . 如果已设置 属性，则所有挂起的更改都将包括在批处理的单个更改集中，并将在单个 HTTP 请求中提交到数据服务。If is set, all pending changes are included in a single change set in a batch and submitted to the data service in a single HTTP request. 这要求目标服务支持批处理。This requires that the target service supports batching. 未设置 时：If is not set: - 采用 之类的方法将更改发送到数据服务：一个 HTTP 请求一个操作。Changes are sent to the data service such as in the method: one operation to one HTTP request. - 始终为 200。The is always 200. - 属性会返回空集合。The property returns an empty collection. 已设置 时：If is set: - 如果在处理变更集中的某个操作时出错，则不会尝试处理该变更集中的后续操作；然而，数据服务将继续处理批处理中的下一个变更集。If an error occurs processing an operation in a change set, the subsequent operations in the change set will not be tried; however, the data service will continue to process the next change set in the batch. - 已设置 的情况下无法设置此选项，因为启用批处理时，所有操作都将放置在单个更改集中。This option cannot be set when is set because when batching is enabled, all operations are positioned in a single change set. 未设置 时：If is not set: - 如果在处理操作时出错，则数据服务将不处理任何附加操作，If an error occurs while processing an operation, no additional operations are processed by the data service. 而是改为生成响应，告知客户端已执行的操作、操作结果以及因错误而未尝试的操作。A response is generated telling the client which operations were executed, their results, and what operations were not tried because of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据标准的 begin-end 异步模式，在检索查询结果时将调用所提供的回调。According to the standard begin-end asynchronous pattern, the provided callback is invoked when query results are retrieved. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步操作](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Operations](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md). 调用回调时，已从 HTTP 流读取所有结果，但尚未处理这些结果；尚未具体化或修改面向本地用户的对象，并且尚未进行标识解析。When the callback is invoked, all results have been read from the HTTP stream, but they have not been processed; no local user-facing objects have been materialized or modified and identity resolution has not occurred. 调用 时，将创建并返回 ，但仍然不会处理这些结果。When is invoked, a is created and returned but the results still have not been processed. 仅当用户枚举结果时，才会进行标识解析、对象具体化和相关操作。Identity resolution, object materialization, and manipulation occur only when the user enumerates the results. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何通过调用 方法以启动查询来执行异步查询。The following example shows how to execute an asynchronous query by calling the method to start the query. 内联委托调用 方法以显示查询结果。The inline delegate calls the method to display the query results. 此示例使用基于 Northwind 数据服务，它创建完成后添加服务引用工具生成的[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#ExecuteQueryAsync](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/cs/source.cs#executequeryasync)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#ExecuteQueryAsync](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/source.vb#executequeryasync)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于通过 URI 查询数据服务；该方法会导致将 HTTP GET 请求发送给数据服务。The method is used to query a data service by URI; the method causes an HTTP GET request to be issued to the data service. 指定的请求 URI 可为绝对值或相对值。The request URI specified can be absolute or relative. 如果 `requestUri` 为绝对值，则此方法用于验证 URI 是否指向构造 时所指定的数据服务。If the `requestUri` is absolute, this method validates whether the URI points to the same data service that was specified when constructing the . 如果 `requestUri` 为相对值，则此方法会将构造 `requestUri` 时所提供的内容与任何前导斜杠剥离并对其追加 。If the `requestUri` is relative, this method strips off any leading slashes and appends `requestUri` to what was provided when constructing the . 将在传递给 构造函数的 URI 后面追加斜杠（如果斜杠不存在）。A slash is appended after the URI passed to the constructor, if one is not already present. 此方法返回时，已从网络流读取请求的所有 HTTP 响应，但尚未对响应进行处理；没有标识解析或对象具体化。When this method returns, all of the HTTP response for the request has been read from the network stream, but the response will not have been processed; there is no identity resolution or object materialization. 在枚举响应中的指定实体之前，尚未对该实体进行标识解析或完全对象具体化操作。Identity resolution and full object materialization do not occur for a specified entity in the response until it is enumerated. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `do…while` 循环从数据服务的分页结果中加载 `Customers` 实体。This example uses a `do…while` loop to load `Customers` entities from a paged results from the data service. 通过使用下一链接 URI 调用 方法来接收下一页数据。The method is called by using the next link URI to receive the next page of data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将查询指定为 实例。The queries are specified as instances. 返回表示整个批处理请求响应的 。Returns a that represents the response of the batch request as a whole. 单个查询响应表示为单个 对象，可通过枚举 实例进行访问。Individual query responses are represented as individual objects that can be accessed by enumerating the instance. 此方法返回时，已从网络流读取批处理请求的整个 HTTP 响应，但尚未对这些响应进行处理。When this method returns the whole HTTP response for the batch request has been read from the network stream, but the responses have not been processed. 在枚举响应中的指定实体之前，未对该实体进行标识解析或对象具体化操作。No identity resolution or object materialization occurs for a specified entity in the response until it is enumerated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法来执行一个 对象数组，该数组包含从 Northwind 数据服务同时返回 `Customers` 和 `Products` 对象的查询。The following example shows how to call the method to execute an array of objects that contains queries that return both `Customers` and `Products` objects from the Northwind data service. 此示例将枚举返回的 中的 对象的集合，并且还会枚举每个 中包含的对象的集合。The collection of objects in the returned is enumerated, and the collection of objects that is contained in each is also enumerated. 此示例使用基于 Northwind 数据服务，它创建完成后添加服务引用工具生成的[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，将调用网络操作以获取属性值。Calling this method invokes a network operation to fetch the property value. 指定的属性可以是实体的任一属性，包括表示关联或链接的属性。The property specified may be any one of the properties on the entity, including properties that represent associations or links. 如果属性是表示关联、链接或延迟的属性，则调用此方法时，会向客户端提供延迟加载相关资源的方式。If the property represents an association, link or deferred property, calling this method provides the client a way to lazily load related resources. 如果实体处于未更改或已修改状态，则属性值将加载相关实体，并将这些实体与未更改链接一起标记为“未更改”If the entity is in the unchanged or modified state, the property value loads the related entities and marks them unchanged with unchanged links 如果已加载属性，则调用此方法可让您刷新该属性的值。If the property is already loaded, calling this method lets you refresh the value of the property. ## Examples 以下示例演示如何显式加载与每个返回的 `Customers` 实例相关的 `Orders` 对象。The following example shows how to explicitly load the `Customers` object that is related to each returned `Orders` instance. 此示例使用基于 Northwind 数据服务，它创建完成后添加服务引用工具生成的[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许重写客户端库所用的默认类型解析。Enables override of the default type resolution used by the client library. 将此属性设置为一个委托，以便确定某个函数，从而将客户端应用程序中的类型解析为命名空间限定的类型名称。Set this property to a delegate that identifies a function that is used to resolve a type in the client application to a namespace-qualified type name. 这可以让客户端在服务器响应中提供的类型名称与客户端上的类型之间进行自定义映射。This enables the client to perform custom mapping between the type name provided in a response from the server and a type on the client. > [!NOTE] > 使用此方法可重写实体名称，该实体名称已序列化为指定类型的目标表示形式，如 Atom 或 JSON。This method enables override of the entity name that is serialized to the target representation, such as Atom or JSON, for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许重写客户端库所用的默认类型解析策略。Enables override of the default type resolution strategy that is used by the client library. 将此属性设置为一个委托，以便确定某个函数，从而将命名空间限定的类型名称解析为客户端应用程序中的某一类型。Set this property to a delegate that identifies a function that resolves a namespace-qualified type name to a type in the client application. 这可以让客户端在服务器响应中提供的类型名称与客户端上的类型之间进行自定义映射。This enables the client to do custom mapping between the type name provided in a response from the server and a type on the client. 重写类型解析还允许插入类型名称和类型之间的自定义映射策略。Overriding type resolution also enables inserting a custom mapping strategy between a type name and a type. 它并不影响响应具体化为已标识类型的方式。It does not affect how a response is materialized to the identified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 状态下创建了新链接。A new link is created in the state. 将此新链接添加到新创建的链接集，下次调用 时，会将该链接集发送到数据服务。The adds this new link to the set of newly created links to be sent to the data service on the next call to . 如果目标参数为 null，则应移除或删除由 sourceProperty 表示的链接（将该链接转为 状态）。If the target argument is null, the link represented by sourceProperty should be removed or deleted (The link is moved to the state). 链接是单向关系。Links are one-way relationships. 如果返回指针存在，该值指示两个方法关联，此方法应再次调用以通知的第二个链接If a back pointer exists indicating a two way association, this method should be called again to notify the of the second link 此方法仅支持将链接添加到多重性为 1 的关系（源属性为对象引用）。This method only supports adding links to relationships with multiplicity = 1 (The source property is an object reference). 例如，如果类 `Person` 通过 `Person` 属性与另一 `Friend` 类相关联，则此调用可用于将 `Person` 与 `Person` 进行关联。For example, if a class `Person` is related to another `Person` by a `Friend` property, this call could be used to relate `Person` to `Person`. 如果所代表的 `sourceProperty` 具有多基数关系，则此方法将引发异常。This method will throw an exception if the `sourceProperty` represented has a relationship of cardinality more than one. ## Examples 以下示例演示如何使用 和 方法来创建用于定义关系的链接。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create links that define relationships. 在此示例中，还显式设置了 `Order_Details` 对象的导航属性。In this example, the navigation properties on the `Order_Details` object are also explicitly set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置是与相关联的媒体资源的二进制流`entity`，这种行为称为媒体链接入口。The method sets the binary stream that is the Media Resource that is associated with the `entity`, which is called a Media Link Entry. 调用 方法将实体标记为媒体链接入口。Calling the method marks the entity as a Media Link Entry. 实体状态也将设置为 ，以便在下次调用 方法时将该流发送到数据服务。The entity state is also set to so that the stream will be sent to the data service the next time that the method is called. 方法从头到尾读取 。The method reads the through to the end. 未对 尝试 操作。A operation is not tried on the . 当`closeStream`是`true`，则方法在返回之前关闭流。When `closeStream` is `true`, the method closes the stream before it returns. 即使出错且未读取该流，也会将其关闭。The stream is closed even when an error occurs and the stream is not read. 当 `entity` 已应用 时，媒体资源不能为数据流。When the `entity` has the applied, the Media Resource cannot be a data stream. 在尝试为 `entity` 设置数据流之前，请移除此属性。Remove this attribute before you try to set the data stream for the `entity`. 未对 `args` 中设置的标头进行任何验证。No validation is performed on the headers that are set in `args`. 因此，请不要以更改请求含义的方式来更改 HTTP 标头。Therefore, do not change an HTTP header in a way that changes the meaning of the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性控制是否允许发送到数据服务的创建、更新和删除请求使用协议的 POST 隧道功能。This property controls whether create, update, and delete requests sent to the data service will use the post tunneling feature of the protocol or not. 如果设置为 true，则使用隧道功能。When set to true, tunneling is used. 如果设置为 false，则使用标准的 HTTP 方法。When set to false, standard HTTP methods are used. 此属性的默认值为 false。The default value of this property is false.
